zap_name: C&D Railway AI Notifications - Complete Lead Management
description: Empfängt Railway AI Webhook und sendet Email-Benachrichtigungen für alle Kanäle (Email, SipGate, WhatsApp)

email_config.subject: 🤖 C&D AI: {{channel}} von {{from}} - {{summary}}
email_config.body_html:
